I'm now 6 months into it and looking for much more technical work. This is proving to be harder then getting my first job.

author: @Recklessness97
text: The problem is finding a place or company who will hire you. It's tough. Especially with little to no previous experience. I have an Associate degree in Business and the Google Data Analytics Professional Cert. I built a portfolio and GitHub, tailored my resume/cover letter to each job specially and still no luck. I've applied to ten jobs that I meet or exceeded the requirements last month and got no interviews. It's very discouraging and sucks. I feel there's always applicants with more credentials applying to the entry level jobs I am applying to.
